circle.description: Circle border-radius is used as icon background shape and as avatar shape.

pill.description: This is for creating pill shaped tags and similar.

sharp.description: Sharp border-radius resets the corners to be sharp with no rounding.

xs.description: This is extra small border radius.

m.description: This is the default border Radius.

xl.description: This is extra large border radius.

xs.description: Can be used for overline or eyebrow text (0.6875rem)

s.description: Can be used for small text or caption

m.description: Headins S can be used for small heading or eyebrow

l.description: Headins S can be used for small heading or eyebrow

xl.description: Headins S can be used for small heading or eyebrow

2xl.description: Heading L font size is used for large sub-headings.

3xl.description: Heading XL font size is used for the main heading on tablet size.

4xl.description: Heading 2XL font size is used for the main heading on desktop.

5xl.description: Display M font size is for marketing purposes and banners.

6xl.description: Display L font size is for marketing purposes and banners.

normal.description: Normal font weight is used for body text and form inputs together with “Text” font family.

medium.description: Medium font weight is used for buttons and sub headings together with “Text” font family.

semi-bold.description: Semi bold font weight is used for headings and strong text only together with “Text” font family.

bold.description: Bold font weight is used for headings and strong text only together with “Text” font family.

primary.description: Text font family uses a font stack that gracefully degrades to default system fonts on different platforms. Should be used for body text and form controls.

xs.description: This token can be used when you don’t want line height taking any extra space.

s.description: This is the default line height for headings.

m.description: Medium line-height is used for the main body text. Basically everything else except the headings and sidebar (and a few other exceptions).

quickly.description: Use this design token for a quick transition. Most often used for button, link and form input hover effects.

promptly.description: Use this design token for a slow transition. Used for example in modals, tooltips, collapsing elements, and more.

slowly.description: Use this design token for a slow transition. Used for example in mobile navigation.

xl.description: Extra large devices (large desktops, less than 1400px)

deep.description: Deep z-index is used to stack something behind everything else.

default.description: The default z-index for components and elements inside components.

masked.description: Default z-index for masked interface elements.

mask.description: Default z-index for masking interface elements.

sticky.description: Default z-index for sticky interface elements.

overlay.description: Default z-index for modal and popup overlays.

spinner.description: Default z-index for spinners, stacking on top of overlay.

modal.description: Default z-index for modals that stacks on top of overlays and other elements, but still allows popups to be visible.

popover.description: Default z-index for popovers that stacks on top of all other elements.

primary.description: Color for any primary texts such as titles

secondary.description: Color for secondary texts such as subtitles and paragraphs

inverse.description: Default text on primary color. Used when text sits on a dark background.

weak.description: Used for disabled input text and placeholder text in focused inputs.

link-hover.description: Primary links hover state text color

critical.description: Background surface color for critical or error. Can be used in critical alert surface and badge error surface color.

success.description: Background surface color for success alert.

warning.description: Background surface color for alert or warning.

smooth-low.description: Default box shadow. Used with buttons, active states, text fields, checkbox, radio button.

smooth-medium.description: Lowest elevation cards, Top navigation, Bottom navigation

smooth-high.description: Default box shadow for card, drop-downs, select-menus component that creates both shadow and border around the card.

strong-low.description: Default box shadow for navigation component. Used in collapsed state. e.g. Floating Action Button (FAB),

strong-medium.description: Default box shadow to be used with all pop out windows. e.g. Banners, Snackbars, Toast Message, Non modal Dialogs, Side Panels

strong-high.description: Default box shadow for modal component. Used in dialogs, modals, and such.

neutral.description: Focused state for secondary button, plain button.

primary.description: Focused state for primary button and inputs.

critical.description: Focused state for critical button and inputs.
